description:
The Advanced Excel training will help me get my job done very quickly and easily. The things that I used to take many hours will now take only a few minutes with the use of formulas, macros and other tricks I learnt in the Excel 2010 workshop Excel’s own language – VBA, allows us to give instructions to Excel to get things done. This is a simple, but extremely powerful way to extend Excel’s functionality. Advanced users of Excel are familiar with VBA & can write macros to automate their day to day work, thus saving countless hours of time & money. 

Formulas make Succeed intelligent. Without them, Succeed is just a knowledge maintaining device. But by using treatments, you can crisis information, evaluate it and get solutions to most complicated concerns. While anyone can use a simple SUM or IF system, a sophisticated customer of it would be able to easily create & merge treatments like SUMIFS, SUMPRODUCT, INDEX, MATCH, LOOKUP treatments. Apart from understanding the treatments, innovative Succeed customers know how to debug them, review them and how to use which system for which event (and they also know few options for any given system problem).

Excel has many powerful & advanced features packaged into it. Data tables: help us model practical problems & analyze massive amount of data for a solution. Solver: helps us model practical problems & find a solution by iterating thru all possibilities. For example, finding cheapest way to ship goods from one location to another.Simulations: We can simulate real world data & situations in Excel using various random functions & statistical methods.

title: Advanced-Microsoft-Excel Course
